EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PUBLIC SERVICE REARRANGEMENT AND TRANSFER OF DUTIES ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order Transferring from the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development to the Minister of Health the Control and Supervision of the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency and Ordering the Minister of Health to Preside over the Agency

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph 2(a)a of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Actb, transfers from the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development to the Minister of Health the control and supervision of the portion of the federal public administration known as the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: orders that the Minister of Health shall preside over the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency.
